last_episode_to_air.name: The Release
last_episode_to_air.overview: Canadian police tactics are brought into question as Alan Smith goes to court and faces a potential life sentence in prison.

name: The Unsolved Murder of Beverly Lynn Smith
original_name: The Unsolved Murder of Beverly Lynn Smith
overview: Follows the cold case and controversial investigation into the murder of Beverly Lynn Smith in her home in Oshawa, Ontario. Woven together from first hand accounts, expert interviews, family archives, and rare access to key participants, The Unsolved Murder of Beverly Lynn Smith is an unpredictable tale that explores the unrelenting enigma of ethics and accountability in this provocative criminal case.

episodes.name: The Catch
episodes.overview: When Alan Smithâ€™s new fishing buddy draws him into a world of increasingly dangerous criminality, it leads him back to a cold case murder from deep in his past and a shocking new revelation.

episodes.name: The Girl Next Door
episodes.overview: First hand accounts of December 9th, 1974 reveal potential murder suspects. Barbra Brown will stop at nothing to solve her twin sister's murder.

episodes.name: Alibi
episodes.overview: Durham Regional Police focus their attention on a new person of interest.

episodes.name: The Release
episodes.overview: Canadian police tactics are brought into question as Alan Smith goes to court and faces a potential life sentence in prison.
